sources.title: Sweet Sunshine | Full Movie | Feel Good Drama
sources.description:
Sweet Sunshine - After his rise to fame causes a rift with his father, a young superstar suffers a tragedy that will change his life forever. Can a chance meeting with a talented young woman give him the strength he needs to believe in himself?
2020.  Stars: John Way, Savanah D. McMahon, Julie Van Lith
